Edges-Professional -- Female Engro Heroic Explorer
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Spirited: +1 Spirit step
Skills (35 Points):
Boating: (agi) d8 Knowledge (Arcana): (sma) d8 Riding: (agi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d8 Knowledge (Law): (sma) d8 Shooting: (agi) d8
Healing: (sma) d8+2 Knowledge (The Seas): (sma) d8 Streetwise: (sma) d8+1
Intimidation: (spi) d6 Notice: (sma) d8 Survival: (sma) d8
Languages: Battletongue; Engrosi; Fingerspeak; Finnari
Skill Notes:
Charisma: +1 Persuasion/+1 Streetwise
Sister Of Mercy: +2 Healing/+1 Charisma
Sneaky: +2 Skill Points (choice of Stealth or Lockpicking)
Bad Eyes: -2 on distant visual trait rolls and ranged attacks w/out corrective lenses
Blood Feud: -2 Charisma (rival family)
Bludgeoner: +1 Charisma (engros)
Doomsman: +2 Charisma (community)/+2 Knowledge (Law) (evidence)/+2 Smarts (evidence)
Hearth Knight: +1 Parry and +2 called shots vs. cold-resistant and -immune creatures
Horse Lord: d8 Wild Die with Riding/Mount shares Parry and resistance
Master Mariner: Ignores 2 penalty points on Boating/May spend Benny to Soak boat damage/Boat +1 top speed
Outsider: -2 Charisma (other races)
Sister Superior: Successful Healing-2 on allied Extra immediately after wound reduces to Shaken
Speed Rider: Mount +2 Pace/May suffer mount fatigue to gain dbl running dice
Size: -1 Deity: Scaetha
Advances: 14 Improvement Points: 32 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 2; Skill: 18
Description Notes: Small (Engro): -1 Size
Features
Edges (1 points): Arcane Hand; Bastion Of Strength; Block; Bludgeoner; Bodyguard; Brothers-In-Arms; Censure Demons; Deathdealer; Doomsman; Double The Load; Dragon Guard; Gravetouched; Hearth Knight; Hellfrost Hardened; Hellfrost Hardy; Horse Lord; Hrosmark Huscarl; Improved Double The Load; Iron Guild Mercenary; Master Bludgeoner; Master Mariner; Not Just A Sling; Protect The Cargo; Sea Legs; Share Spell; Shieldwall; Sister Of Mercy; Sister Superior; Speed Rider; Veteran Dragon Guard; Watcher Of The Black Gate Hindrances: Bad Eyes; Blood Feud; Disowned; Pacifist Engro Features: Luck (Engro); Outsider; Small (Engro); Sneaky; Spirited
Feature Notes:
Disowned: Outcast from family
Dragon Guard: Has Arcane Resistance, Favored Foe, and Giant Killer features with marsh dragons and marsh orms
Iron Guild Mercenary: +1 using Gang Up
Luck (Engro): +1 Benny each session
Veteran Dragon Guard: Has Champion features and +2 vs. paralysis with marsh dragons and marsh orms
Combat
Parry: 8 (1) Cover: 2 Toughness: 6 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Blessed Robes Shield: Medium Shield Weapons: Crossbow (2d6 R15"); Lance (d8+d8); Unarmed (d8+d0); Warhammer (d8+d6)
Combat Notes:
Block: +1 Parry
Bludgeoner: +4 sling range/Sling does d8+d6 damage at short range
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Improved Double The Load: Increased Double The Load effects
Small (Engro): -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Arcane Hand: May interrupt foe spellcasting (+2 if on Hold)
Bastion Of Strength: Adjacent allies share Censure Demons and Watcher Of The Black Gate features and Spirit resistance vs. Demon fear and Intimidation
Bodyguard: May share Parry with adjacent ally
Brothers-In-Arms: Takes -1 damage per each Iron Guildsman w/in 6" (-4 max)
Censure Demons: Has Champion and Holy Warrior features vs. Demons
Deathdealer: May make free attack on adjacent undead after slaying undead 1/rd
Double The Load: May sling two stones simultaneously
Gravetouched: +2 resistance vs. undead abilities and necromantic spells
Hearth Knight: +2 Survival (freezing environments)
Hellfrost Hardened: +2 Armor and Trait rolls vs. cold damage and powers
Hellfrost Hardy: Second Shaken condition from cold does not cause wound
Hrosmark Huscarl: Gains Steady Hands feature and may Aim when mounted
Iron Guild Mercenary: Member of Iron Guild mercenary company
Master Bludgeoner: Sling inflicts Str+d8 (short range) or Str+d6 (medium range)
Not Just ASling: Never unarmed with sling/+2 Disarm and Grapple
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option available
Protect The Cargo: +1 Fighting and Toughness when protecting adjacent cargo
Sea Legs: Suffers no penalty for shot, reduces running shot penalty by 1, and gains +1 Parry while aboard ship
Shieldwall: Shield benefit applies to adjacent ally
Watcher Of The Black Gate: +2 vs. demon powers
Arcana
Arcana Notes: Share Spell: Gains benefits of adjacent master's spells
Notes
Validation Warnings: Blessed Robes: Blessed Robes benefits require Arcane Background (Miracles)
Validation Errors:
Edge Allocation: 1 available vs. 31 allocated
Hrosmark Huscarl Edge: Requires race (currently Engro) == 'Saxa Human', agility (currently 8) >= 8, fighting skill (currently 8) >= 8, riding skill (currently 6) >= 6 and shooting skill (currently 8) >= 8
